metadata.title: CVE-2023-36674 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.11, 1.36.x through 1.38.xbefore 1.38.7, 1.39.x before 1.39.4, and 1.40.x before 1.40.1. It ispossible to bypass the Bad image list (aka badFile) by using the thumbparameter (aka Manualthumb) of the File syntax.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
